title: Crime Alert 12.06.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.06.18
description:
Seven NY hospitals charge sexual assault victims for their rape kits. Mom admits she helped hide her murdered son's body in concrete. Woman arrested for trying to kidnap new born.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
